entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle and a few flurries changing to snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:07 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:07 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
